title: Introducing: Retro Culture
content:
Now I don’t want it to seem like I’m getting carried away, but I think Melbourne’s Matt Connelly might be a disco genius.

Seriously, a Daft Punk or a Depeche Mode would kill for these hooks. Recent cut Hypnotized sounds like it’s been lifted from Random Access Memories, and I mean that in the most positive way possible.

With seven tracks on his Soundcloud, with plays barely breaking the one thousand marker, it’s criminal that Retro Culture is so underrated. So it’s far from the most complex set of compositions you’ll hear this year, but for what it is, it’s sheer brilliance. Check out a couple more tracks of Retro Culture’s below, and grab the rest over at his Soundcloud.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
